weapons.name: Pitchfork of the Peasantry
weapons.description: Rusty but reliable. Farmers wield it with surprising fury.

weapons.name: Bronze Age Kopesh
weapons.description: An old-world weapon, still sharp, still deadly.

weapons.name: Blunderbuss of Misfires
weapons.description: Roll a d20: on a 1–3, it backfires and hits you instead.

weapons.name: War Gong
weapons.description: Struck with a mallet, its sound deafens foes for 1 round.

weapons.name: Flamberge of Endless Cuts
weapons.description: Each hit causes ongoing 1 damage per round until healed.

weapons.name: Crowbar of Urban Exploration
weapons.description: Grants advantage on breaking doors and locks.

weapons.name: Enchanted Spatula
weapons.description: Does double damage to food-based creatures. Can flip pancakes perfectly.

weapons.name: Vorpal Bunny Slipper
weapons.description: Natural 20s decapitate enemies with HD 6 or less. Surprisingly comfy.

weapons.name: Parking Meter of Justice
weapons.description: Ripped from a city street. Still dispenses parking tickets on crits.

weapons.name: Nerf Crossbow of Serious Business
weapons.description: Office warfare has never been so professional.

weapons.name: Frying Pan of the Iron Chef
weapons.description: Can cook a meal and crack skulls in the same round.

weapons.name: Lightsaber (Batteries Not Included)
weapons.description: Works for 1d4 rounds before needing new batteries.

armor.name: Bone Shaman Vest
armor.description: Woven from sacred bones, rattles ominously during battle.

armor.name: Ironwood Shield
armor.description: Carved from enchanted trees; resists most blows but burns easily.

armor.name: Clay Plate Harness
armor.description: Heavy armor made from baked clay tiles. Strong, but shatters on a critical hit.

armor.name: Kevlar Vest of Questionable Legality
armor.description: No questions asked. Seriously, don't ask.

armor.name: Cardboard Box Suit
armor.description: Grants advantage on hiding near shipping areas. Dissolves in rain.

armor.name: Duct Tape Plate Mail
armor.description: If it moves and shouldn't, use duct tape. If it doesn't move and should, WD-40.

armor.name: Bubble Wrap of Protection
armor.description: Each bubble popped reduces AC bonus by 1. Irresistible to pop.

armor.name: Hazmat Suit of the Janitor
armor.description: Protects against acid and toxic fumes. Smells like industrial cleaner.

armor.name: Riot Gear of Civil Unrest
armor.description: Grants +2 to intimidate protesters and -2 to diplomacy with civilians.

armor.name: Medieval Cosplay Armor
armor.description: Looks impressive from a distance. Made at the Ye Olde Factory in China.

armor.name: Leather Jacket of Rebellion
armor.description: Grants immunity to peer pressure and +1 to motorcycle riding.

consumables.name: Rotgrub in a Jar
consumables.effect: throw as weapon: 1d6 ongoing damage unless burned

consumables.name: Pickled Troll Finger
consumables.effect: Heals 1d4 HP, but may regrow hair in strange places.

consumables.name: Black Lotus Smoke
consumables.effect: Grants visions, +2 to spellcasting for 1 hour, then 1d6 poison damage.
consumables.description: Banned in most cities, prized by cults.

consumables.name: Stout of Stonebrew
consumables.effect: +2 AC for 1 hour, but movement halved.
consumables.description: Dwarven ale said to turn one's skin to granite.

consumables.name: Sizzling Salamander Skewer
consumables.description: Popular street food in desert markets.

consumables.name: Energy Drink of Infinite Jitters
consumables.effect: No sleep for 24 hours, +3 to all actions, then crash for 12 hours.
consumables.description: Warning: May cause heart palpitations and reality distortion.

consumables.name: Expired Yogurt of Courage
consumables.effect: Immune to fear for 1 hour. 50% chance of food poisoning.
consumables.description: The expiration date was three weeks ago. Dare you risk it?

consumables.name: Pill of Plot Convenience
consumables.effect: Instantly learn one piece of information relevant to current quest.
consumables.description: Side effects may include deus ex machina.

consumables.name: Instant Ramen of Sustenance
consumables.effect: Prevents hunger for 24 hours, but you crave real food constantly.
consumables.description: College survival food. Just add hot water.

consumables.name: Antacid of Acid Immunity
consumables.effect: Immune to acid damage for 1 hour.
consumables.description: Also settles your stomach after eating questionable dungeon rations.

consumables.name: Protein Bar of Gains
consumables.effect: +1 Strength for 8 hours, but you must describe your workout routine to everyone.

consumables.name: Kombucha of Questionable Benefits
consumables.effect: Roll d20: 1-10 nothing, 11-15 +1 to saves, 16-19 minor healing, 20 enlightenment
consumables.description: Tastes like vinegar but the health food store swears by it.

consumables.name: Vitamin Gummies of Childhood
consumables.effect: Heal 1 HP, reduce age by 1 year for 24 hours.
consumables.description: Flintstones brand. Makes you feel young again.

accessories.name: Amulet of Forgotten Gods
accessories.effect: +1 Will save, whispers ancient blasphemies at night.
accessories.description: A cracked stone pendant etched with runes of the void.

accessories.name: Sandwalker Anklet
accessories.description: Favored by nomads of the Great Dunes.

accessories.name: Cloak of Vexing Patterns
accessories.effect: Enemies attacking must pass a Will save or be distracted.
accessories.description: The shifting embroidery causes dizziness if stared at too long.

accessories.name: Ring of Questionable Sponsorship
accessories.effect: Once per day, summon a random item from a corporate sponsor.
accessories.description: Inscribed with mysterious brand sigils like 'Coca-Khaos'.

accessories.name: Bluetooth Earbuds of Isolation
accessories.effect: Immune to sonic attacks, -2 to perception of everything else.
accessories.description: You can't hear the haters, but you also can't hear the dragon.

accessories.name: Smartwatch of Endless Notifications
accessories.effect: Always know the time and weather. Constantly distracts you.
accessories.description: Pings every 30 seconds with updates you don't need.

accessories.name: Wallet of Infinite Receipts
accessories.effect: Can produce a receipt for any purchase, real or imagined.
accessories.description: Useful for returns and tax purposes. Origin of receipts questionable.

accessories.name: Fanny Pack of Holding
accessories.description: Maximum utility, minimum style. Your parents think it's practical.

accessories.name: Mood Ring of Obvious Emotions
accessories.effect: Changes color based on wearer's mood. Everyone can see it.
accessories.description: Eliminates the need for emotional intelligence.

accessories.name: Friendship Bracelet of Binding
accessories.effect: Wearer and creator share 1 HP of damage between them.
accessories.description: Made at summer camp. The bond is disturbingly literal.

accessories.name: Glasses of Perfect Hindsight
accessories.effect: Can see exactly what you should have done 5 minutes ago.

accessories.name: Belt of Tool Time
accessories.effect: Can produce any common tool, but it breaks after one use.

accessories.name: Socks of Silent Steps
accessories.effect: +3 to stealth, but you leave no footprints for tracking.
accessories.description: Wool blend. Machine washable. Surprisingly tactical.

miscellaneous.name: Idol of the Crawling Chaos
miscellaneous.effect: whispers secrets at night, DC 12 Will save or go mad

miscellaneous.name: Goblin Dice
miscellaneous.effect: roll to gamble, 50% chance they bite

miscellaneous.name: Lantern of Red Smoke
miscellaneous.effect: illuminates but fills room with choking fumes

miscellaneous.name: Book of Infinite Margins
miscellaneous.effect: blank, but new scribbles appear daily

miscellaneous.name: Portable Hole (Leaky)
miscellaneous.effect: stores up to 50 lbs before it seeps out

miscellaneous.name: Goblin Market Token
miscellaneous.effect: Trade for strange goods in hidden markets.
miscellaneous.description: A small brass coin with shifting faces engraved.

miscellaneous.name: Traveling Merchant Bell
miscellaneous.effect: Summons a wandering peddler within 1d4 hours.
miscellaneous.description: Its ring carries across planes and realities.

miscellaneous.name: Fool's Gold Nugget
miscellaneous.effect: Looks like gold, fools 90% of merchants.
miscellaneous.description: Actually worthless, but convincing.

miscellaneous.name: Bone Dice of the Ancestors
miscellaneous.effect: Roll 2d6 once per day; on 7, gain +1 Luck, otherwise nothing happens.
miscellaneous.description: Said to carry the voices of your lineage.

miscellaneous.name: Cultural Mask of the Jade Isles
miscellaneous.effect: Worn during rituals, grants +2 Persuasion with islanders.
miscellaneous.description: Brightly painted, sacred to a distant culture.

miscellaneous.name: Rubber Duck of Debugging
miscellaneous.effect: Explains coding problems when you talk to it. Works 60% of the time, every time.
miscellaneous.description: A programmer's best friend. Squeaks judgmentally.

miscellaneous.name: USB Cable of Universal Compatibility
miscellaneous.effect: Connects to any device, but data transfer is random.
miscellaneous.description: Finally, one cable to rule them all. May transfer your photos to someone else's phone.

miscellaneous.name: Magic 8-Ball of Questionable Advice
miscellaneous.effect: Answers yes/no questions. 30% chance of being correct.
miscellaneous.description: Reply hazy, try again. Outlook not so good. All signs point to maybe.

miscellaneous.name: Lava Lamp of Hypnosis
miscellaneous.effect: Anyone staring at it for more than 1 minute must make a Will save or be mesmerized.
miscellaneous.description: Groovy, man. Far out. The blobs... they speak to you...

miscellaneous.name: IKEA Manual of Assembly
miscellaneous.effect: Can construct furniture from raw materials. Instructions make no sense.
miscellaneous.description: Wordless pictographs that somehow convey deep existential dread.

miscellaneous.name: Participation Trophy of Self-Esteem
miscellaneous.effect: Grants +1 to all rolls, but everyone knows you didn't really earn it.
miscellaneous.description: You showed up! That's something, right? ...Right?

miscellaneous.name: Snow Globe of Tiny Worlds
miscellaneous.effect: Shake to view alternate versions of current location.
miscellaneous.description: In one version, everyone is tiny. In another, it's always Christmas.

miscellaneous.name: Spam Email of Infinite Wealth
miscellaneous.effect: Promises vast riches from Nigerian princes. Never delivers.
miscellaneous.description: You are the chosen one! Send social security number for fortune!

miscellaneous.name: Kitchen Timer of Dramatic Tension
miscellaneous.effect: When started, creates suspense. Everyone acts with urgency until it goes off.
miscellaneous.description: *tick tick tick* The tension is killing everyone.

miscellaneous.name: Inspirational Poster of Motivation
miscellaneous.effect: Grants +1 to morale saves, -1 to cynicism saves.
miscellaneous.description: HANG IN THERE - featuring a kitten dangling from a branch.

miscellaneous.name: Autographed Photo of B-List Celebrity
miscellaneous.effect: Can be traded for minor favors from specific fandoms.
miscellaneous.description: To my biggest fan! - Someone from that show you kind of remember.

miscellaneous.name: Convention Program Guide
miscellaneous.effect: Navigate convention centers without getting lost.
miscellaneous.description: Schedule already outdated. Half the events moved rooms.

miscellaneous.name: Turkey Leg of Renaissance Sustenance
miscellaneous.effect: Heals 2d4 HP, grants +1 Strength for 1 hour, grease on everything.
miscellaneous.description: Huzzah! Nothing says medieval like oversized poultry!

miscellaneous.name: Mead Horn of Questionable Hygiene
miscellaneous.effect: Contains mysterious liquid, +1 to courage, -1 to judgment.
miscellaneous.description: Previous owner unknown. Smells like honey and regret.

miscellaneous.name: Chainmail Coif Tutorial Video
miscellaneous.effect: Learn to make authentic medieval armor (in 6-8 months).
miscellaneous.description: Dave from the forge explains ring welding for beginners.

miscellaneous.name: Bag of Dice (100 count)
miscellaneous.effect: Always have the right die, but spend 10 minutes finding it.
miscellaneous.description: Every gamer's obsession. You can never have too many dice.

miscellaneous.name: Cosplay Wig of Character Accuracy
miscellaneous.effect: Perfect character appearance, incredibly hot to wear.
miscellaneous.description: Anime hair defies physics and comfort.

miscellaneous.name: Booth Babe Business Card Collection
miscellaneous.effect: Social proof of convention attendance.
miscellaneous.description: Remember when conventions had booth babes? Pepperidge Farm remembers.

miscellaneous.name: Gargoyle Statue (Mall Store)
miscellaneous.effect: Intimidates delivery drivers, attracts goths.
miscellaneous.description: Purchased from Spencer's. Guards your dorm room with plastic menace.

miscellaneous.name: Handmade Scroll of Character Backstory
miscellaneous.effect: Provides detailed character history no one will read.
miscellaneous.description: 47 pages of tragic orphan history and mysterious birthmarks.

miscellaneous.name: Wooden Tankard of Tavern Authenticity
miscellaneous.effect: Makes any drink taste more medieval.
miscellaneous.description: Splinters optional. Do not machine wash.

miscellaneous.name: Flashlight with Dead Batteries
miscellaneous.effect: Provides dim light for 1d4 minutes before dying.
miscellaneous.description: Always dies at the worst possible moment. Murphy's Law in action.

miscellaneous.name: Swiss Army Knife (Missing Tools)
miscellaneous.effect: Has 15 functions, 12 of them broken.
miscellaneous.description: The corkscrew still works. Priorities, right?

miscellaneous.name: Duct Tape of Universal Repair
miscellaneous.effect: Temporarily fixes anything. Emphasis on temporarily.
miscellaneous.description: If you can't fix it with duct tape, you're not using enough.

miscellaneous.name: Stress Ball of Office Therapy
miscellaneous.effect: Squeeze to reduce stress. -1 to workplace violence.
miscellaneous.description: Shaped like your boss's head. Purely coincidental.

miscellaneous.name: Expired Coupon Book
miscellaneous.effect: Great deals that no longer apply.
miscellaneous.description: Save $1.00 on products you don't want! (Offer expired 2019)

miscellaneous.name: Assembly Instructions (In Swedish)
miscellaneous.effect: Provides guidance for furniture assembly in incomprehensible language.
miscellaneous.description: Step 1: Öppna lådan. Step 2: Förvirring. Step 3: Profit?

miscellaneous.name: Remote Control (Wrong TV)
miscellaneous.effect: Controls electronic devices, but never the right ones.
miscellaneous.description: Works on your neighbor's TV through the wall. Chaos ensues.

miscellaneous.name: Junk Drawer Contents
miscellaneous.effect: Contains random useful items. Roll d20 to see what you find.
miscellaneous.description: Rubber bands, old batteries, mysterious keys, and regret.

miscellaneous.name: Garden Gnome of Passive Aggression
miscellaneous.effect: Judges your life choices silently.
miscellaneous.description: Ceramic disapproval in lawn ornament form.

miscellaneous.name: Manual for Electronic Device You No Longer Own
miscellaneous.effect: Provides perfect instructions for something you threw away.
miscellaneous.description: 320 pages of detailed information about your old phone.

miscellaneous.name: Spare Change Jar
miscellaneous.effect: Contains 1d10 copper pieces and foreign coins.
miscellaneous.description: Emergency funds! If emergencies cost less than $3.47.

miscellaneous.name: Takeout Menu Collection
miscellaneous.effect: 50% of restaurants no longer exist.
miscellaneous.description: A history of your neighborhood's dining establishments.

miscellaneous.name: Ball of Rubber Bands
miscellaneous.effect: Infinite rubber bands, finite patience to untangle them.
miscellaneous.description: Office desk archaeology at its finest.
